class.name: ScriptDebugger
class.description: [ScriptDebugger] handles low level tasks related to debugging, including managing breakpoints and initiating debug breaks.

method.name: debug
method.description: Starts a debug break in script execution, optionally specifying whether the program can continue based on [param can_continue] and whether the break was due to a breakpoint.

method.name: get_lines_left
method.description: Returns the number of lines that remain.

method.name: insert_breakpoint
method.description: Inserts a new breakpoint with the given [param source] and [param line].

method.name: is_breakpoint
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param source] and [param line] represent an existing breakpoint.

method.name: remove_breakpoint
method.description: Removes a breakpoint with the given [param source] and [param line].

method.name: set_lines_left
method.description: Sets the current debugging lines that remain.
